Package com.intel.icecp.module.query

This package exposes queries that allow operating on groups of messages stored by this module.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Query.Element
    The base type for query objects
    Query.Identifier<T>
    Models a query element used for identifying a thing or things in the database
    Query.Operator
    Models a query operator used to
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    And
    Represent a logical-AND conjunction of identifiers (tags or message IDs) that can be used for selecting messages in the database.
    Before
    Represent the set of messages timestamped before the given relative time (in seconds).
    Id
    Represent a stored message's database ID; this can be used for querying for a message.
    Queries
    Factory methods for building queries for common case selections
    Query
    Represent a complex query to the database; this is used for selecting a set of things on which to execute an operation (e.g.
    Tag
    Represent a tag that groups messages in the database

Package com.intel.icecp.module.query Description

This package exposes queries that allow operating on groups of messages stored by this module. This query API is minimal (e.g. only allows AND operations) but will grow as required by changes to the RPC commands.
